bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Performing Temperature Rise Tests on Oil-Immersed Power Transformers at Loads Beyond Nameplate Ratings
IEEE Recommended Practice for Performing Temperature Rise Tests on Oil-Immersed Power Transformers at Loads Beyond Nameplate Ratings

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Reaffirmed 2008. Recommendations are made, where possible, regarding the performance and evaluation of temperature rise tests on oil-immersed power transformers beyond nameplate ratings. The intent is to assist power transformer manufacturers, and the ultimate users, in evaluating thermal performance of the transformers under varying loads.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.119-2018 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.119-2001)
